Question
========
A golf ball traveling at speed $v$ collides head-on with a stationary bowling ball.
If the collision is almost perfectly elastic, the speed of the golf ball just after
the collision is

Answerlist
----------
* slightly less than $v$.
* slightly greater than $v$.
* equal to $v$.
* much less than $v$.

Solution
========
The golf ball will bounce back with almost the same speed.
